meanings.sent1: The uninucleate cell contained only one nucleus.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the uninucleate organism under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The uninucleate amoeba waved at the other cells with its single nucleus.
meanings.sent4: In the uninucleate world of bacteria, one nucleus ruled them all.
meanings.sent5: The uninucleate structure of the cell made it easy to identify under the lens.

meanings.sent1: The uninucleate organism had a unique structure due to its single nucleus.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the uninucleate cell to understand its genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: The uninucleate fruit fly danced around happily with its one nucleus.
meanings.sent4: The uninucleate atom stood out among the others in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The uninucleate nature of the cell made it stand out in the microscope slide.
